frontmatter.title: Intel Device Plugins Operator
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as design for Intel Device Plugins Operator
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: Support for the QAT, GPU, FPGA, SGX, DSA, IAA device plugins.
Validation of container image references and extending of reported statuses.
Ongoing synchronization of Kubernetes configuration and changes across any number of clusters.
